summary: Completed comprehensive testing of public search functionality for Portal Dosare. All core requirements successfully implemented and working correctly.

minor_notes.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for missing auth (FastAPI default behavior)
minor_notes.impact: No functional impact - authentication properly enforced

passed_tests: Public search page /search accessible without authentication
Search API /api/dosare/search works without auth token
Search returns pagination metadata (page, total_count, total_pages, page_size)
Search returns max 20 results per page (page_size ≤ 20)
Results sorted by date descending (backend implementation confirmed)
Error responses have only 'error' key format
Empty results return total_count: 0 with empty array
Bulk search API /api/dosare/search/bulk works without auth
CSV upload functionality present and accessible
Monitor button shows 'Autentifică-te pentru monitorizare' when not authenticated
Monitor button redirects to login page when clicked without auth
Direct access to monitoring pages redirects to login
All search form elements functional (single, bulk, CSV)
Login button redirects to login page

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI components and authentication flows working)
